name: Flabébé

evolution.description: Flabébé can evolve into Floette at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Single Bloom Pokémon. It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

abilities.name: Flower Veil
abilities.description: Any grass-type ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to new status effects.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.description: This Pokémon may swap held items with an ally as a free action, as long as they are within 15 feet of each other.
